revised_code.chunk: diff --git a/aws-datastore/src/main/java/com/amplifyframework/datastore/DataStoreConfigurationProvider.java b/aws-datastore/src/main/java/com/amplifyframework/datastore/DataStoreConfigurationProvider.java index c4efc43e..3c304cbb 100644 --- a/aws-datastore/src/main/java/com/amplifyframework/datastore/DataStoreConfigurationProvider.java +++ b/aws-datastore/src/main/java/com/amplifyframework/datastore/DataStoreConfigurationProvider.java @@ -16,7 +16,7 @@ package com.amplifyframework.datastore; /** - * Implementations of this interface should provide access to a DataStoreConfiguration + * Implementations of this interface should provide access to a {@link DataStoreConfiguration} * that represents the configuration used across all DataStore underlying components. * * Plugin-specific implementations are expected to document specific behaviors and/or side-effects.
